dish_en_th: Khao Yam Pak Tai (ข้าวยำปักษ์ใต้)
dish_en: Khao Yam (Southern Thai Rice Salad)
dish_th: ข้าวยำปักษ์ใต้
description_en: Khao Yam Pak Tai is a Southern Thai rice salad featuring steamed rice mixed with a variety of fresh herbs, vegetables, toasted coconut, dried shrimp, and a sweet shrimp paste dressing. It offers a refreshing and balanced flavor.
description_zh: 泰南风味拌饭，采用蒸米饭搭配新鲜香草、蔬菜、烤椰丝、干虾及甜味虾酱调料，风味清新均衡。
instructions_en: Boil coconut water with shrimp paste, brown sugar, palm sugar, shallots, lemongrass, galangal, and kaffir lime leaves.
Season with fish sauce and stir gently until the dressing comes to a boil.
Add pounded dried shrimp into the dressing and mix well.
Arrange steamed rice and other salad ingredients (herbs, vegetables, toasted coconut, dried shrimp, pomelo, chilies) on a plate.
Pour the warm shrimp paste dressing over the salad before serving.
instructions_zh: 将椰子水与虾酱、红糖、棕榈糖、红葱头、香茅、南姜和青柠叶一起煮沸。
用鱼露调味，轻轻搅拌至酱汁沸腾。
加入捣碎的干虾，搅拌均匀。
将蒸米饭和其他配料（香草、蔬菜、烤椰丝、干虾、柚子、辣椒）摆盘。
食用前淋上温热的虾酱调料。
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai cuisine
tags: rice salad, southern, herbs, coconut, shrimp

dish_en_th: Gaeng Tai Pla (แกงไตปลา)
dish_en: Gaeng Tai Pla (Southern Thai Spicy Curry)
dish_th: แกงไตปลา
description_en: A signature Southern Thai spicy curry made with fermented fish viscera (Tai Pla), combined with vegetables and herbs. It is known for its bold and complex flavors.
description_zh: 泰南特色辣咖喱，采用发酵鱼肠（Tai Pla）与蔬菜和香草煮制，风味浓烈复杂。
instructions_en: Pound all curry paste ingredients into a smooth paste.
Boil the Tai Pla with kaffir lime leaves, lemongrass, and galangal. Strain and set aside to reduce the strong odor.
Boil water and add the prepared curry paste.
Add strained Tai Pla broth and season with sugar and lime juice.
Add sweet potatoes, Thai eggplant, purple eggplant, bamboo shoots, kaffir lime leaves, chilies, and mackerel.
Simmer until vegetables are tender and the flavors are well combined.
Remove from heat and serve with steamed rice.
instructions_zh: 将所有咖喱酱材料捣成细腻的酱料。
用青柠叶、香茅和南姜煮发酵鱼肠 (Tai Pla)，煮沸后过滤，去腥备用。
煮水，加入捣好的咖喱酱。
加入过滤后的 Tai Pla 汤，调味加糖和青柠汁。
加入红薯块、泰国茄子、小紫茄子、竹笋、青柠叶、辣椒和鲭鱼。
煮至蔬菜软嫩，味道融合。
关火，配米饭食用。
nutrition: Sodium: High due to Tai Pla and shrimp paste (~1200 mg)
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai cuisine
tags: curry, spicy, southern, fish, tai pla

dish_en_th: Kua Kling Moo (คั่วกลิ้งหมู)
dish_en: Kua Kling Moo (Southern Thai Spicy Dry Pork Curry)
dish_th: คั่วกลิ้งหมู
description_en: Kua Kling Moo is a fiery Southern Thai dry-fried minced pork dish with a bold flavor of curry paste and kaffir lime leaves. It is one of the most popular Southern Thai dishes among spicy food lovers.
description_zh: 泰南特色干炒猪肉咖喱，香辣浓郁，搭配青柠叶风味十足，是深受辣味爱好者喜爱的泰南美食。
ingredients_en: 2 tablespoons Kua Kling curry paste (adjust to taste)
ingredients_zh: 2 汤匙泰南干炒咖喱酱（可根据口味调整）
instructions_en: Pound Kua Kling curry paste with shrimp paste until well combined. Set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a pan. When hot, add minced pork and stir-fry until nearly cooked.
Add the prepared curry paste and stir-fry with the pork until fragrant.
Season with palm sugar and fish sauce. Adjust taste as desired.
Turn off the heat and add sliced kaffir lime leaves and fresh green peppercorns. Mix well.
Serve with fresh vegetables and steamed rice.
instructions_zh: 将泰南干炒咖喱酱与虾酱捣拌均匀，备用。
锅中加热植物油，油热后加入猪肉末翻炒至接近熟。
加入调好的咖喱酱，继续翻炒至香味四溢。
加入棕榈糖和鱼露调味，根据口味调整。
关火，加入青柠叶丝和新鲜青胡椒，翻拌均匀。
搭配新鲜蔬菜和米饭食用。
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai cuisine

dish_en_th: Moo Pad Kapi (หมูผัดกะปิ)
dish_en: Moo Pad Kapi (Stir-fried Pork with Shrimp Paste)
dish_th: หมูผัดกะปิ
description_en: Moo Pad Kapi is a Southern Thai stir-fried pork dish cooked with shrimp paste and aromatic herbs. It offers a savory umami flavor and pairs perfectly with steamed rice.
description_zh: 泰南虾酱炒猪肉，采用虾酱和香料炒制，风味鲜美浓郁，搭配米饭食用绝佳。
ingredients_en: 250 g pork collar (sliced thick, with some fat)
1 tablespoon palm sugar or granulated sugar
instructions_en: Pound shrimp paste, garlic, shallots, lemongrass, and bird's eye chilies into a smooth paste. Set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a pan over low heat. Add the pounded mixture and stir-fry until fragrant.
Add pork slices and stir-fry until fully cooked.
Season with palm sugar to taste.
Add sliced kaffir lime leaves and red chilies. Stir to combine.
Serve hot with steamed rice.
instructions_zh: 将虾酱、大蒜、红葱头、香茅和小米椒捣成细腻酱料，备用。
锅中小火加热植物油，加入捣好的酱料翻炒至香味溢出。
加入猪肉片，翻炒至全熟。
加入棕榈糖调味，按口味调整。
加入青柠叶丝和红辣椒，翻拌均匀。
热食，搭配米饭食用。
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai cuisine
tags: stir-fried, savory, southern, pork, shrimp paste

dish_en_th: Kai Khrop (ไข่ครอบ)
dish_en: Kai Khrop (Southern Thai Steamed Salted Duck Egg Yolks)
dish_th: ไข่ครอบ
description_en: Kai Khrop is a traditional Southern Thai delicacy made from duck egg yolks cured with salt and steamed. The result is a rich, savory yolk with a soft, slightly molten center. It is often enjoyed as a side dish or a flavorful topping.
description_zh: 泰南传统小吃，采用鸭蛋黄腌制后蒸制而成，蛋黄香浓软嫩，常作为配菜或风味小吃食用。
instructions_en: Prepare the eggs by cracking only the top of the shell to remove the contents, carefully separating the yolks into a clean container. Reserve the eggshells.
Clean the eggshells by soaking in clean water, then drain and trim the shells to about 3/4 height using scissors.
Gently spoon two yolks into each prepared eggshell.
Dissolve salt in boiled water and pour a little salted solution over the yolks. Let them cure for 5-6 hours.
Steam the yolks in their shells for 3-5 minutes until the surface is set while the inside remains soft.
Serve as a side dish or topping. Delicious with a variety of Thai dishes.
instructions_zh: 将鸭蛋顶部轻轻敲开，取出蛋液，分离蛋黄，小心放入备用容器中，保留蛋壳。
将蛋壳清洗干净，沥干后用剪刀剪去约 3/4 高度。
将 2 个蛋黄轻轻放入处理好的蛋壳中。
将盐溶于煮沸水中，舀少量盐水淋在蛋黄上，腌制 5-6 小时。
将蛋黄连壳蒸 3-5 分钟，表面熟而内部保持柔软。
可作为配菜或搭配其他泰式菜肴食用，美味可口。
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai snacks
tags: snack, egg, southern, duck egg, salted yolk

dish_en_th: Bai Liang Pad Kai (ใบเหลียงผัดไข่)
dish_en: Bai Liang Pad Kai (Southern Thai Stir-fried Melindjo Leaves with Egg)
dish_th: ใบเหลียงผัดไข่
description_en: Bai Liang Pad Kai is a Southern Thai stir-fried dish made with Malindjo leaves (Bai Liang) and eggs. It is a simple yet nutritious dish with a delicate flavor, often served as part of a family meal.
description_zh: 泰南风味炒菜，采用马尼拉叶（Bai Liang）与鸡蛋炒制，简单又富有营养，常见于家庭餐桌。
instructions_en: Wash Bai Liang leaves thoroughly and drain. Pick only tender and medium leaves. Tear larger leaves in half if necessary.
Heat a pan over medium heat. Add vegetable oil.
Stir-fry minced garlic until fragrant.
Add Bai Liang leaves and stir-fry until slightly wilted.
Crack the eggs into the pan. Season with light soy sauce and oyster sauce.
Stir and fold the eggs into the leaves until well combined and cooked.
Transfer to a serving plate and garnish with dried shrimp. Serve hot.
instructions_zh: 将马尼拉叶洗净，沥干水分。挑选嫩叶和中等叶，较大的叶子可撕成两半。
锅中中火加热，倒入植物油。
加入蒜末炒香。
倒入马尼拉叶，翻炒至稍微软化。
打入鸡蛋，加入生抽和蚝油调味。
翻炒搅拌，使鸡蛋与叶子充分混合并煮熟。
装盘，撒上干虾，趁热食用。
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai cuisine
tags: stir-fried, vegetable, southern, egg, bai liang

dish_en_th: Moo Hong (หมูฮ้อง)
dish_en: Moo Hong (Southern Thai Braised Pork Belly)
dish_th: หมูฮ้อง
description_en: Moo Hong is a traditional Southern Thai braised pork belly dish with Chinese influence. The pork is marinated with garlic, Chinese wine, and five-spice powder, then slowly braised until tender and flavorful.
description_zh: 泰南传统卤肉，受中式影响，采用猪五花肉搭配大蒜、绍兴酒和五香粉慢炖，入口软嫩入味。
ingredients_en: 1 tablespoon five-spice powder or braising spice blend
instructions_en: Clean the pork belly and cut into thick 2x2 inch pieces. Set aside.
In a mixing bowl, combine minced garlic, Chinese cooking wine, and five-spice powder.
Add pork belly pieces and mix well to coat evenly. Marinate for 30 minutes.
Heat a pan over medium heat. Add the marinated pork and stir-fry until lightly browned and fragrant.
Add water and bring to a boil. Simmer and braise over low heat for about 30 minutes until the pork is tender and the sauce is reduced.
Adjust seasoning with soy sauce and sugar if desired. Serve hot with steamed rice.
instructions_zh: 将五花肉清洗干净，切成约 2x2 英寸厚块，备用。
碗中加入蒜末、绍兴酒和五香粉，搅拌均匀。
将五花肉块加入腌料中拌匀，腌制 30 分钟。
锅中中火加热，加入腌好的五花肉，翻炒至微焦且香味溢出。
加入水煮沸，转小火慢炖约 30 分钟，至五花肉软烂、汤汁收浓。
根据口味可加酱油和糖调味，搭配米饭热食。
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai cuisine

dish_en_th: Bai Liang Tom Kati (ใบเหลียงต้มกะทิ)
dish_en: Bai Liang Tom Kati (Southern Thai Melindjo Leaves Coconut Soup)
dish_th: ใบเหลียงต้มกะทิ
description_en: Bai Liang Tom Kati is a Southern Thai coconut milk soup made with tender Bai Liang (Malindjo) leaves, shrimp, and aromatic herbs. It is rich, creamy, and slightly savory, balancing the sweetness of coconut milk with the flavors of herbs.
description_zh: 泰南椰奶炖马尼拉叶，搭配鲜虾和香料，汤汁浓郁香滑，椰奶的甜味与香料的风味相得益彰。
instructions_en: Wash Bai Liang leaves thoroughly and drain. Pick tender leaves and cut large leaves into smaller pieces.
Clean fresh shrimp, peel, devein, and set aside.
Pound shallots, shrimp paste, and white peppercorns into a smooth paste.
In a pot over medium heat, add coconut cream and bring to a gentle boil.
Add the pounded spice paste and stir until well combined. Then add dried shrimp.
When the coconut cream boils again, add coconut milk and bring to a gentle boil.
Add fresh shrimp and cook until just done.
Add Bai Liang leaves, submerge them into the soup.
Season with sugar and salt. Let the soup gently simmer.
Once the leaves are tender and the flavors well blended, turn off the heat and serve hot.
instructions_zh: 将马尼拉叶洗净，沥干，挑选嫩叶，较大叶子切小备用。
将鲜虾清洗干净，去壳去虾线，备用。
将红葱头、虾酱和白胡椒捣成细腻酱料。
锅中中火加热椰浆，煮至微沸。
加入捣好的酱料，搅拌均匀，再加入大干虾。
椰浆再次沸腾后，倒入椰奶，继续煮至微沸。
加入鲜虾，煮至变色熟透。
加入马尼拉叶，压入汤中。
加入白糖和食盐调味，保持小火炖煮。
叶子软化，味道融合后关火，趁热食用。
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai cuisine
tags: soup, coconut milk, southern, vegetable, shrimp

dish_en_th: Kai Tom Khamin (ไก่ต้มขมิ้น)
dish_en: Kai Tom Khamin (Southern Thai Turmeric Chicken Soup)
dish_th: ไก่ต้มขมิ้น
description_en: Kai Tom Khamin is a Southern Thai turmeric chicken soup. Tender chicken is simmered with fresh turmeric and aromatic herbs, resulting in a light, fragrant broth known for its comforting and health-boosting qualities.
description_zh: 泰南黄姜炖鸡，采用鲜姜黄与多种香料炖煮，鸡肉嫩滑，汤清香爽口，具有滋补养生的功效。
ingredients_en: 1 kg chicken thigh with bone, chopped
instructions_en: Bring the broth to a rolling boil.
Add the bruised herbs: lemongrass, galangal, coriander roots, turmeric, garlic, shallots, and kaffir lime leaves.
Once aromatic, add the chicken pieces.
Reduce heat to maintain a gentle simmer to keep the broth clear.
Season with salt and fish sauce.
Skim off any foam for a clear broth.
Simmer until the chicken is tender and infused with the herbal flavors.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot.
instructions_zh: 将高汤煮沸。
加入拍碎的香料：香茅、南姜、香菜根、姜黄、大蒜、红葱头和青柠叶。
香气溢出后，加入鸡块。
调小火保持微沸，以保持汤清澈。
加入食盐和鱼露调味。
撇去浮沫，使汤更加清澈。
慢炖至鸡肉软嫩、汤汁入味。
撒上新鲜香菜，趁热食用。
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai cuisine

dish_en_th: Kaeng Lueang Pla Kapong (แกงเหลืองปลากะพง)
dish_en: Kaeng Lueang Pla Kapong (Southern Thai Sour and Spicy Yellow Curry with Sea Bass)
dish_th: แกงเหลืองปลากะพง
dish_zh: 泰南酸辣黄咖喱鲈鱼汤
description_en: Kaeng Lueang Pla Kapong is a Southern Thai sour and spicy yellow curry made with sea bass and green papaya. The broth is vibrant with turmeric, chili, and herbs, delivering a bold and refreshing flavor.
description_zh: 泰南酸辣黄咖喱鲈鱼汤，采用鲈鱼和青木瓜烹制，汤色鲜亮，姜黄与辣椒和香料交织出浓郁清新的风味。
ingredients_zh: 1 条鲈鱼（清理干净，取鱼片）
instructions_en: Pound dried red chilies and salt in a mortar until fine.
Add bird's eye chilies, garlic, turmeric, shallots, and galangal. Continue pounding until smooth to form curry paste.
Peel green papaya, clean the sap, and slice into thin pieces.
Clean and fillet the sea bass. Cut fillets into bite-sized pieces.
Boil 1 ½ liters of water in a pot.
Add the prepared curry paste and shrimp paste. Stir to dissolve.
Bring to a boil, then add green papaya slices. Simmer until the papaya turns translucent.
Gently add sea bass fillets, submerging them without stirring until cooked.
Season with tamarind paste.
Turn off the heat and add lime juice.
Serve hot with steamed rice.
instructions_zh: 将干红辣椒和食盐放入研钵中捣细。
加入小米椒、大蒜、姜黄、红葱头和南姜，继续捣成细腻的咖喱酱。
将青木瓜去皮、去籽、切薄片，备用。
将鲈鱼清理干净，取鱼片，切成适口大小。
锅中加 1 ½ 升水煮沸。
加入捣好的咖喱酱和虾酱，搅拌溶解。
煮沸后加入青木瓜片，煮至木瓜变透明。
轻轻放入鱼片，不要搅拌，等待鱼熟。
加入罗望子酱调味。
关火，加入青柠檬汁。
搭配米饭趁热食用。
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai cuisine

dish_en_th: Khao Mok Gai (ข้าวหมกไก่)
dish_en: Khao Mok Gai (Southern Thai Chicken Biryani)
dish_th: ข้าวหมกไก่
description_en: Khao Mok Gai is a Southern Thai chicken biryani, featuring fragrant jasmine rice cooked with marinated chicken and a blend of aromatic spices. Served with spicy seafood sauce and crispy shallots, it is a popular dish loved by locals and tourists alike.
description_zh: 泰南风味鸡肉香饭，采用香米与腌制鸡肉及多种香料煮制而成，搭配酸辣海鲜酱和酥炸洋葱，深受当地人和游客喜爱。
ingredients_en: Coriander and red chili for garnish
instructions_en: Wash and pat dry the chicken thighs and drumettes.
In a bowl, combine yogurt, evaporated milk, salt, sugar, and half of the mixed spices (bay leaves, cloves, coriander, cumin, cinnamon, turmeric, curry powder). Marinate the chicken for 2 hours.
Melt butter in a rice cooker on cook mode. Add shallots and marinated chicken. Pan-fry the chicken skin side down until golden brown (do not fully cook). Reserve the rendered fat.
Rinse jasmine rice and drain well.
In the rice cooker, heat the reserved fat, add the remaining spices, then add jasmine rice. Stir-fry until fragrant.
Add enough water to cover the rice, place the chicken pieces on top, and cook using the rice cooker.
Once the rice cooker switches to warm mode, let it sit for 5 minutes.
Mold the rice into a small bowl, invert onto a serving plate, garnish with coriander, red chili, and fried shallots.
Serve with seafood dipping sauce and the cooked chicken.
instructions_zh: 将鸡腿和鸡翅中段洗净擦干。
碗中混合酸奶、淡奶、食盐、白糖和一半香料（包括月桂叶、丁香粉、香菜籽粉、孜然粉、肉桂粉、姜黄粉、咖喱粉），腌制鸡肉 2 小时。
电饭煲中加热黄油，炒香红葱头，放入腌制好的鸡肉，皮朝下煎至金黄（不必煮熟），留下煎出的油备用。
茉莉香米洗净沥干。
电饭煲中倒入煎鸡油，加剩余香料翻炒出香味，加入米饭翻炒均匀。
加入适量清水没过米饭，将鸡块放在米饭上，启动电饭煲煮饭程序。
饭煮好后，保温 5 分钟。
将米饭盛入小碗压实后倒扣至盘中，装饰香菜、红辣椒和炸红葱头。
配上海鲜蘸酱和煮熟的鸡肉食用。
dietary_tags: contains gluten (depending on curry powder used)
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai cuisine
tags: rice, chicken, southern, spiced rice, tourist-friendly

dish_en_th: Kaeng Prik Kradook Moo On (แกงพริกกระดูกหมูอ่อน)
dish_en: Kaeng Prik Kradook Moo On (Southern Thai Spicy Pork Rib Curry)
dish_th: แกงพริกกระดูกหมูอ่อน
description_en: Kaeng Prik Kradook Moo On is a Southern Thai spicy pork rib curry made with young pork ribs simmered in a rich, fragrant chili paste. The dish is hearty and pairs perfectly with steamed rice or rice noodles.
description_zh: 泰南辣椒炖嫩排骨，采用嫩猪排骨搭配香浓辣椒酱炖煮，口感浓郁，搭配米饭或米粉皆宜。
ingredients_en: 1 small rack of young pork ribs
instructions_en: Clean and cut young pork ribs into bite-sized pieces.
In a pot, simmer pork ribs with salt and enough water until tender. Reserve the cooking broth and set ribs aside.
Prepare the curry paste: blend dried chilies, garlic, shallots, peppercorns, lemongrass, galangal, turmeric, and fermented soybean disc with 1 teaspoon salt until smooth.
In a pan, sauté the curry paste with a little water until fragrant.
Add the cooked pork ribs and stir briefly.
Gradually add reserved pork broth to cover the ribs.
Simmer and skim off any foam. Add kaffir lime leaves.
Continue simmering until the pork is tender and the sauce is reduced to a thick consistency.
Serve hot with steamed rice or fresh rice noodles.
instructions_zh: 将嫩猪排骨洗净，切成适口大小。
锅中加盐和适量清水煮排骨至软嫩，留煮肉汤备用，将排骨捞出。
准备咖喱酱：将干辣椒、大蒜、红葱头、胡椒粒、香茅、南姜、姜黄和豆豉片加 1 茶匙盐一起搅打成细腻酱料。
锅中加少量水，炒香咖喱酱。
加入煮好的排骨，稍微翻炒。
逐步加入煮肉汤，没过排骨。
炖煮过程中撇去浮沫，加入青柠叶。
继续炖煮至排骨软烂，汤汁收浓。
搭配米饭或新鲜米粉食用。
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai cuisine
tags: curry, spicy, southern, pork ribs, turmeric

dish_en_th: Pla Sai Tod Khamin (ปลาทรายทอดขมิ้น)
dish_en: Deep-Fried Sand Whiting with Turmeric (Southern Thai Style)
dish_th: ปลาทรายทอดขมิ้น
description_en: Pla Sai Tod Khamin is a Southern Thai deep-fried sand whiting seasoned with fresh turmeric and garlic. Crispy and aromatic, this dish is commonly enjoyed with steamed rice and a side of spicy seafood dipping sauce.
description_zh: 泰南姜黄炸沙鱼，采用新鲜姜黄和大蒜腌制炸制，外酥内嫩，搭配米饭和泰式海鲜蘸酱食用风味更佳。
ingredients_en: 400 g sand whiting fish (Pla Sai), cleaned
Equal amount of garlic (by volume with turmeric)
instructions_en: Clean the fish thoroughly and pat dry with paper towels. Let air dry slightly.
Slice fresh turmeric and roughly pound with garlic.
Rub the turmeric and garlic mixture onto the fish and marinate for 5-10 minutes.
Remove the turmeric and garlic from the fish. Rub salt evenly over the fish.
Heat palm oil in a pan until hot.
Deep-fry the fish on high heat, cooking one side at a time until crispy and golden brown. Avoid flipping too often.
Remove fish and drain excess oil.
Fry the garlic and turmeric separately until crispy and fragrant. Use as garnish for the fish.
Serve with steamed rice and optionally with seafood dipping sauce.
instructions_zh: 将鱼彻底清洗干净，用厨房纸巾擦干水分，稍微风干。
将鲜姜黄切片，与大蒜一起粗捣。
将姜黄蒜蓉均匀抹在鱼身上，腌制 5-10 分钟。
腌制后将姜黄蒜蓉取出，均匀撒盐于鱼身。
锅中倒入棕榈油，加热至高温。
将鱼放入热油中，炸至一面金黄酥脆，再翻面，避免频繁翻动。
炸好后捞出沥油。
将蒜蓉和姜黄片放入油中炸至香酥，作为鱼的装饰。
搭配米饭和泰式海鲜蘸酱食用更佳。
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai cuisine

dish_en_th: Hor Mok Talay (ห่อหมกทะเล)
dish_en: Hor Mok Talay (Thai Steamed Seafood Curry Custard)
dish_th: ห่อหมกทะเล
description_en: Hor Mok Talay is a traditional Thai steamed seafood curry custard. Blended with red curry paste, coconut milk, and aromatic herbs, this dish is wrapped in banana leaves and steamed to perfection.
description_zh: 泰式海鲜椰奶蒸糕，采用红咖喱、椰奶和香草混合海鲜蒸制，包裹在香蕉叶中，风味浓郁。
ingredients_en: 1 kg finely minced fish (Snakehead fish or equivalent)
4 tablespoons finely sliced kaffir lime leaves
Seafood of choice (squid, shrimp, mussels, fish fillet)
Banana leaves and toothpicks for wrapping
ingredients_zh: 1 公斤鱼肉糜（蛇头鱼或同类鱼）
喜欢的海鲜（鱿鱼、虾、青口、鱼片）
香蕉叶和牙签用于包裹
instructions_en: In a mixing bowl, combine red curry paste, shrimp paste, minced fish, and eggs. Knead well.
Add palm sugar, sliced kaffir lime leaves, and coconut milk. Mix until smooth.
Fold in seafood of choice and knead gently.
Prepare banana leaves for wrapping. Place wild betel leaves and sweet basil leaves at the bottom, then scoop the mixture on top. Fold and secure with toothpicks.
Preheat a convection oven or air fryer to 180°C.
Bake the wrapped Hor Mok for 10-15 minutes until cooked through.
Serve hot.
instructions_zh: 碗中混合红咖喱酱、虾酱、鱼肉糜和鸡蛋，揉匀。
加入棕榈糖、青柠叶丝和椰奶，搅拌至顺滑。
加入喜欢的海鲜，轻轻揉匀。
准备香蕉叶，将野胡椒叶和甜罗勒叶铺底，舀入混合物，包好，用牙签固定。
预热风炉或空气炸锅至 180°C。
将包好的海鲜蒸糕烤制 10-15 分钟至熟。
趁热食用。

dish_en_th: Yam Sa-Lai Phuang O-ngun (ยำสาหร่ายพวงองุ่น)
dish_en: Yam Sa-Lai Phuang O-ngun (Sea Grape Salad)
dish_th: ยำสาหร่ายพวงองุ่น
description_en: Yam Sa-Lai Phuang O-ngun is a refreshing Thai salad featuring sea grapes (green caviar), blanched shrimp and squid, and a tangy-spicy dressing. It highlights the natural crispness of sea grapes with vibrant Thai flavors.
description_zh: 葡萄海藻泰式拌菜，搭配汆烫虾仁和鱿鱼，淋上酸辣调味汁，口感爽脆，风味独特。
ingredients_en: Fresh sea grapes (green caviar), as desired
ingredients_zh: 新鲜葡萄海藻（绿鱼子酱），适量
instructions_en: Gently rinse the sea grapes under cold water. Wash each cluster carefully and drain.
Prepare the spicy dressing by mixing lime juice, fish sauce, sugar, sliced chilies, and sliced onion.
Add blanched shrimp and squid to the dressing and mix well.
When ready to serve, place sea grapes on a serving plate.
Spoon the prepared salad mixture and dressing over the sea grapes, or serve the dressing on the side to preserve the crispness of the sea grapes.
Enjoy immediately for best texture.
instructions_zh: 将葡萄海藻用冷水轻轻冲洗，逐串清洗，沥干备用。
调制酸辣拌汁：混合青柠汁、鱼露、白糖、小米椒片和洋葱片。
将汆烫好的虾仁和鱿鱼加入拌汁，拌匀。
食用时，将葡萄海藻铺在盘中。
将调好的拌料和酱汁淋在葡萄海藻上，或将酱汁另上，保持海藻脆爽口感。
趁鲜食用，口感最佳。

dish_en_th: Nam Prik Kapi + Blanched Vegetables (น้ำพริกกะปิ + ผักลวก)
dish_en: Nam Prik Kapi (Southern Thai Shrimp Paste Chili Dip with Blanched Vegetables)
dish_th: น้ำพริกกะปิ + ผักลวก
dish_zh: 泰式虾酱辣酱配汆烫蔬菜
description_en: Nam Prik Kapi is a classic Thai shrimp paste chili dip served with blanched vegetables. Fragrant and savory, it is an essential dish in Southern Thai cuisine, often enjoyed with fried mackerel and steamed rice.
description_zh: 泰式虾酱辣酱，搭配汆烫蔬菜，是南泰传统特色菜，常与炸鲭鱼和米饭一起食用，风味独特。
ingredients_en: Blanched vegetables of choice (long beans, cabbage, pumpkin, morning glory, etc.)
ingredients_zh: 汆烫蔬菜（四季豆、卷心菜、南瓜、空心菜等）
instructions_en: Wrap shrimp paste in banana leaves and grill until fragrant.
Pound bird’s eye chilies, garlic, and pea eggplant together in a mortar until roughly crushed.
Add grilled shrimp paste and continue pounding until well mixed.
Gradually add boiled water, a little at a time, to achieve desired consistency.
Season with lime juice and coconut sugar to balance the flavors.
Serve with blanched vegetables and optionally with fried mackerel and fried vegetables.
instructions_zh: 将虾酱用香蕉叶包好，烤至香气四溢。
将小米椒、大蒜和野茄子放入臼中捣碎，粗颗粒状即可。
加入烤好的虾酱，继续捣匀。
逐渐加入煮沸水，调整至理想浓稠度。
用青柠汁和椰糖调味，调整酸甜平衡。
搭配汆烫蔬菜食用，亦可搭配炸鲭鱼、炸蔬菜。

dish_en_th: Trang-Style Grilled Pork (หมูย่างเมืองตรัง)
dish_en: Trang-Style Grilled Pork (Southern Thai Honey-Glazed Roasted Pork)
dish_th: หมูย่างเมืองตรัง
description_en: Trang-Style Grilled Pork is a famous Southern Thai roasted pork dish. The pork belly is marinated with honey, aromatic spices, and slowly roasted to achieve a tender texture and crispy skin.
description_zh: 董里府风味烤五花肉，选用猪五花肉，搭配蜂蜜和香料慢烤，肉质鲜嫩，外皮酥脆，泰南著名美食之一。
ingredients_en: Large pork belly slab (6 x 6 inches)
2 heaping tablespoons Trang-style grilled pork seasoning (or five-spice powder as substitute)
ingredients_zh: 大块猪五花肉（约 6 x 6 英寸）
2 大勺董里府烤猪调料（可用五香粉代替）
instructions_en: Preheat the oven to 140°C.
Roast the pork belly for 20-30 minutes until the skin becomes slightly tender.
Remove the pork. Score the meat side with 1-inch wide cuts (avoid cutting through the skin).
Mix honey, grilled pork seasoning, salt, black pepper, and minced garlic. Apply the marinade to the meat side only.
Marinate for at least 2 hours, preferably overnight.
Preheat the oven to 165°C. Roast the marinated pork for 1 hour.
Increase oven temperature to 185°C and roast for another 20-30 minutes until the skin is crispy.
Remove from oven and let cool.
Slice into pieces and serve.
instructions_zh: 烤箱预热至 140°C。
将猪五花肉放入烤箱烤 20-30 分钟，至表皮稍微软化。
取出猪肉，在肉面切宽约 1 英寸的刀口，注意不要切破皮。
将蜂蜜、烤猪调料、盐、黑胡椒和蒜末调匀，涂抹在肉面，避免涂在皮上。
腌制至少 2 小时，隔夜更佳。
烤箱预热至 165°C，放入腌好的猪肉烤 1 小时。
升温至 185°C，继续烤 20-30 分钟，至表皮酥脆。
取出放凉，切片食用。
suitable_for: tourists seeking famous Thai roasted pork

dish_en_th: Pad Sataw Goong (ผัดสะตอกุ้ง)
dish_en: Pad Sataw Goong (Southern Thai Stir-fried Stink Beans with Shrimp)
dish_th: ผัดสะตอกุ้ง
description_en: Pad Sataw Goong is a bold-flavored Southern Thai stir-fried dish made with stink beans (Sataw) and shrimp, seasoned with shrimp paste, lime juice, and chilies. It is beloved for its unique aroma and spicy-savory profile.
description_zh: 泰式臭豆炒虾，采用臭豆和虾仁，搭配虾酱、青柠汁和辣椒炒制，风味浓郁，是南泰经典菜肴。
instructions_en: Pound chilies and garlic in a mortar.
Add shrimp paste and pound to combine. Set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a pan.
Add the pounded chili mixture and stir-fry until fragrant.
Add shrimp and a little water, stir-fry until shrimp are half-cooked.
Add stink beans and stir-fry.
Season with palm sugar, fish sauce, and lime juice. Adjust to taste.
Continue stir-frying until stink beans are cooked through.
Add torn kaffir lime leaves and stir briefly.
Serve hot with steamed rice.
instructions_zh: 将辣椒和大蒜放入臼中捣碎。
加入虾酱一起捣匀，备用。
锅中加热植物油。
放入捣好的辣椒酱料，炒香。
加入虾仁和少量水，炒至半熟。
加入臭豆翻炒。
调入椰糖、鱼露和青柠汁，调整口味。
继续翻炒至臭豆熟透。
加入撕碎的青柠叶，快速翻炒均匀。
配米饭热食。
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai cuisine

dish_en_th: Pla Insee Tod (ปลาอินทรีทอด)
dish_en: Pla Insee Tod (Deep-fried Spanish Mackerel)
dish_th: ปลาอินทรีทอด
description_en: Pla Insee Tod is a simple and popular Thai dish made by pan-frying salted mackerel steak until crispy on the outside and tender inside. It is served with sliced chilies, shallots, and lime for a refreshing contrast.
description_zh: 泰式煎马鲛鱼，选用咸马鲛鱼煎至外酥里嫩，搭配小米椒、红葱头和青柠，风味独特，简单美味。
ingredients_en: 1 piece salted Spanish mackerel steak (Pla Insee)
instructions_en: Slice chilies and shallots. Cut lime into wedges.
Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat.
Fry the salted mackerel steak until golden and crispy on both sides.
Remove from pan and drain excess oil.
Place the fried fish on a serving plate.
Top with sliced chilies and shallots. Serve with lime wedge on the side.
instructions_zh: 将小米椒和红葱头切片，青柠切块备用。
锅中加热适量油，中火。
将咸马鲛鱼排煎至两面金黄酥脆。
捞出沥油，摆盘。
将切好的辣椒和红葱头撒在鱼上，配青柠一起食用。
suitable_for: tourists seeking simple authentic Thai dishes

dish_en_th: Pad Phed Moo Pa (ผัดเผ็ดหมูป่า)
dish_en: Pad Phed Moo Pa (Southern Thai Spicy Stir-fried Wild Boar or Pork)
dish_th: ผัดเผ็ดหมูป่า
description_en: Pad Phed Moo Pa is a fiery Southern Thai stir-fried dish made with wild boar or pork belly, Southern curry paste, aromatic herbs, and vegetables. It is known for its bold, spicy flavors and unique texture.
description_zh: 泰式野猪肉辣炒，采用南泰特色咖喱酱搭配野猪肉或五花肉、香草和蔬菜爆炒，口味浓烈，风味独特。
ingredients_en: 200 g pork belly (or wild boar meat)
A handful of sliced bamboo shoots
A handful of Thai basil leaves
instructions_en: Slice pork belly into bite-sized pieces.
Heat vegetable oil in a pan. Add pork and stir-fry until half-cooked.
Add chili paste, fried garlic, and Southern curry paste. Stir-fry to combine.
Add julienned fingerroot, bamboo shoots, and Thai eggplants. Add a little water if needed.
Season with oyster sauce, fish sauce, seasoning sauce, and sugar. Adjust to taste.
Add Thai basil leaves, torn kaffir lime leaves, and sliced red chilies.
Stir-fry until pork is fully cooked and vegetables are tender.
Serve hot with steamed rice.
instructions_zh: 将五花肉切成适口大小。
锅中加热植物油，放入五花肉炒至半熟。
加入辣椒酱、炸蒜末和南泰咖喱酱，翻炒均匀。
加入指姜丝、竹笋丝和泰国圆茄，适量加水。
调入蚝油、鱼露、调味酱油和白糖，调整口味。
加入九层塔叶、撕碎的青柠叶和红辣椒片。
翻炒至肉熟透、蔬菜软嫩。
配米饭热食。
suitable_for: tourists seeking authentic Southern Thai cuisine
